Random WKT point

Source: R/wkt_point.R
wkt_point.Rd

Random WKT point

wkt_point(count = 1, bbox = NULL, fmt = 7)

Arguments

count

(integer/numeric) number of points. Default: 1
bbox

(integer/numeric) lat/long bounding box from which to generate positions; numeric vector of the form west (long), south (lat), east (long), north (lat). optional
fmt

(integer/numeric) number of digits. Default: 7

Value

WKT; a character vector with one ore more POINT strings

Examples

wkt_point()

#> [1] "POINT (177.3290555 -24.6973475)"
wkt_point(10)

#>  [1] "POINT (6.2946566 -24.6745885)"   "POINT (-44.9494277 29.3703253)" 
#>  [3] "POINT (178.7086565 -2.6245327)"  "POINT (77.6913904 84.2767260)"  
#>  [5] "POINT (-74.5312420 39.6702326)"  "POINT (-33.2661989 34.4723334)" 
#>  [7] "POINT (-154.3166387 29.5627741)" "POINT (54.8926276 -27.9621522)" 
#>  [9] "POINT (114.3047319 22.8313120)"  "POINT (138.6891246 -12.3051206)"
wkt_point(100)

wkt_point(fmt = 5)

#> [1] "POINT (-66.37340 -38.27716)"
wkt_point(fmt = 6)

#> [1] "POINT (144.854676 48.538812)"
wkt_point(fmt = 7)

#> [1] "POINT (23.6005897 48.1348647)"

wkt_point(bbox = c(50, 50, 60, 60))

#> [1] "POINT (56.2759762 50.6760518)"
